Series Number.description: Identifier for the series within the study

Modality.description: Imaging modality used (e.g., WSI for whole slide imaging)

File Format.description: Format of the image file (e.g., SVS, NDPI)

Bits Allocated.description: Number of bits allocated per pixel

Bits Stored.description: Number of bits stored per pixel

High Bit.description: Most significant bit for pixel values

Pixel Spacing.description: Physical distance in the patient between the centers of each pixel

Color Space.description: Color space used in the image (e.g., RGB)

Image Width.description: Width of the image in pixels

Image Height.description: Height of the image in pixels

Image Depth.description: Depth of the image in pixels

File Size.description: Size of the file in bytes

Tile Width.description: Width of each tile in pixels

Tile Height.description: Height of each tile in pixels

Compression.description: Specifies whether lossy compression has been applied to the image

Compression Ratio.description: The compression ratio(s) used for the lossy compressed image data

Compression Method.description: The method(s) used to compress the image

Fixative Type.description: Type of fixative used for the specimen

Staining Method.description: Staining method used to prepare the slide (e.g., H&E, IHC)

Staining Protocol.description: Details of the staining process used

Annotation.description: Descriptions or markers added to the image

Objective Lens.description: Type and magnification of the objective lens used

DPI.description: Dots per inch, a measure of image resolution

Photometric Interpretation.description: Type of image representation (e.g., RGB, MONOCHROME)

Bits Stored.description: Number of bits stored for each pixel

Description.description: Details about the image library version, dimensions, and compression

StripeWidth.description: Width of each stripe in the image

ScanScope ID.description: ID of the ScanScope device used

Date.description: Date when the image was captured

Time.description: Time when the image was captured

Time Zone.description: Time zone of the image capture time

User.description: User ID who captured the image

Parmset.description: Parameter set used, indicating no focus points on the edge

LineAreaXOffset.description: X offset for the line area

LineAreaYOffset.description: Y offset for the line area

Image Width.description: Width of the image in pixels

Image Height.description: Height of the image in pixels

Image Depth.description: Depth of the image in pixels

File Size.description: Size of the file in bytes

Compression Ratio.description: Ratio of compressed to original image

Tile Width.description: Width of each tile in pixels

Tile Height.description: Height of each tile in pixels

Accession Number.description: Identifier of the order request for the study

Modality.description: Type of equipment that created the image

SOP Instance UID.description: Unique identifier for the SOP instance

SOP Class UID.description: Unique identifier for the SOP class

Rows.description: Number of rows in the image

Columns.description: Number of columns in the image

Pixel Spacing.description: Physical distance between the center of each pixel, specified by a numeric pair indicating row and column spacing

Bits Allocated.description: Number of bits allocated for each pixel

Bits Stored.description: Number of bits stored for each pixel

High Bit.description: Most significant bit for pixel values

Samples per Pixel.description: Number of samples (color channels) per pixel

Photometric Interpretation.description: Type of image representation (e.g., RGB, MONOCHROME)

Request Attributes Sequence.description: Sequence that contains attributes of the requested procedure

Performed Procedure Step ID.description: Identifier for the performed procedure step

Performed Procedure Step Description.description: Description of the performed procedure step

Acquisition Context Sequence.description: Sequence that identifies the conditions under which the data was acquired

Lossy Image Compression.description: Specifies whether lossy compression has been applied to the image

Lossy Image Compression Ratio.description: The compression ratio(s) used for the lossy compressed image data

Lossy Image Compression Method.description: The method(s) used to compress the image

Position Reference Indicator.description: An indicator of the frame of reference

Slice Location.description: Relative position of the image plane

Content Date.description: Date the image pixel data creation started

Content Time.description: Time the image pixel data creation started

File Path.description: The path to the NDPI file

Description.description: General description of the image, including scanner model and software version

Magnification.description: The optical magnification used during scanning

MPP.description: Microns per pixel, indicating the resolution of the scan

Image Width.description: The width of the entire scanned image in pixels

Image Height.description: The height of the entire scanned image in pixels

Tile Width.description: The width of individual tiles in the image

Tile Height.description: The height of individual tiles in the image

Bits per sample.description: Number of bits used to represent each pixel value

Compression.description: Compression method used for the image data (e.g., JPEG)

Compression Quality.description: Quality setting used for JPEG compression

Image Depth.description: Number of focal planes or z-slices in the image

Image Channels.description: Number of color channels in the image

Scanner Model.description: Model of the scanner used to capture the image

Scan Date.description: Date when the image was scanned

Scan Time.description: Time when the image was scanned

Exposure Time.description: Exposure time for each image capture

Objective Lens.description: Description of the objective lens used, including magnification and numerical aperture

Z Stack Positions.description: Positions of the focal planes in a z-stack

File Size.description: Size of the NDPI file in bytes

Accession Number.description: Identifier for the study or case

Software Version.description: Version of the software used to capture the image

X Offset.description: X-axis offset for the image tiles

Y Offset.description: Y-axis offset for the image tiles

Z Offset.description: Z-axis offset for the image tiles
